/usr/bin/c++         -o label_interest_points -rdynamic liblabeller.a /home/varsha/opencv-2.4.4/opencv_cmake_dir/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so /home/varsha/opencv-2.4.4/opencv_cmake_dir/lib/libopencv_highgui.so /home/varsha/opencv-2.4.4/opencv_cmake_dir/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so /home/varsha/opencv-2.4.4/opencv_cmake_dir/lib/libopencv_core.so -Wl,-rpath,/home/varsha/opencv-2.4.4/opencv_cmake_dir/lib
